$:/core/macros/tabs.title: $:/core/macros/tabs
$:/core/macros/tabs.text:
\define link-action() <$action-sendmessage $message="$(message)$" $param=<> navigateTo=<>/> \end \define tabs(tabsList,default,state:"$:/state/tab",class,template,buttonTemplate,retain,actions,explicitState) <$set name="qualifiedState" value=<>> <$set name="tabsState" filter="[<__explicitState__>minlength[1]] ~[]">
<$list filter="$tabsList$" variable="currentTab" storyview="pop"><$set name="save-currentTiddler" value=<>><$tiddler tiddler=<>><$button set=<> setTo=<> default="$default$" selectedClass="tc-tab-selected" tooltip={{!!tooltip}}> <$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="no"> <$transclude tiddler="""$buttonTemplate$""" mode="inline"> <$transclude tiddler=<> field="caption"> <$macrocall $name="currentTab" $type="text/plain" $output="text/plain"/> $actions$<$set name=message value={{$:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/config!!link-action}}> <$list filter="[]+[!is[shadow]]" emptyMessage="""<$button tag=span class="wltc-edit-tab" to=<> >{{$:/core/images/link}}""" ><$button tag=span class="wltc-edit-tab" actions=<> ><$reveal type=match text="tm-navigate" state="$:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/config!!link-action">{{$:/core/images/link}}<$reveal type=match text="tm-edit-tiddler" state="$:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/config!!link-action">{{$:/core/images/edit-button}}
<$list filter="$tabsList$" variable="currentTab"> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text=<> default="$default$" retain="""$retain$"""> <$transclude tiddler="""$template$""" mode="block"> <$transclude tiddler=<> mode="block"/>
\end

$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/edit-ta.title: $:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/edit-tabs
$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/edit-ta.caption: Edit-Tabs plugin
$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/edit-ta.text:
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/config" field="show-all-links" checked="inline" unchecked="none" default="none"> Show internal tab link for ''all tabs''</$checkbox>

<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/config" field="show-single-link" checked="inline" unchecked="none" default="inline"> Show internal tab link for ''selected tab''</$checkbox>

<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/config" field="link-action" checked="tm-edit-tiddler" unchecked="tm-navigate" default="tm-edit-tiddler"> Clicking a tab-link opens non-system tiddlers in ''edit mode''</$checkbox>

<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/config" field="initial-opacity" checked="0" unchecked="0.7" default="0.7"> Tab links are initially hidden and need mouse hover to become visible.</$checkbox> The transition time in seconds is: <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/config" field="transition" default="0.3"/>

<$button message="tm-delete-tiddler" param="$:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/config">
Reset to Default!

$:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/config.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/config

$:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/styles.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/styles
$:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/styles.text:
.wltc-edit-tab {
  display: {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/config!!show-all-links}};
  position: relative;
  top: -1em;
  left: -1.3em;
  font-size: 0.7em;
  opacity: {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/config!!initial-opacity}};
  margin-right: -1em;
}

.wltc-edit-tab svg{
  width: 1.4em;
  height: 1.4em;
}

.wltc-edit-tab:hover {
  opacity: 1;
  transition:opacity {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/config!!transition}}s;
  transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(1,-0.06,.39,.89);
}

.tc-tab-selected + .wltc-edit-tab {
  display: {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/config!!show-single-link}};
}

.tc-vertical > .wltc-edit-tab {
  top: -1.9em;
  left: 0;
  height: 0;
  float: right;
}

.tc-search-results .wltc-edit-tab a {
  display: contents;
  padding: 0;
}

$:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/fix-sendme.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/fix-sendmessage.js

$:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/history.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/history
$:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/history.text:
V 3.0.0 - 2020-03-27

* Update edition to TW v5.2.2
* ''Important'': Changed license to Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike -- [[CC-BY-NC-SA|$:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/license]]


V 2.0.1 - 2020-12-25

* update license

V 2.0.0 - 2020.12.05

* Update $:/core/macros/tabs to V5.1.23

V 1.1.1 - 2020.01.19

* Update license link/text

V 1.1.0 - 2019-08

* Change minimum core version to `>=5.1.15`

V1.0.0 - 2019-07-14

* Add new option: Initially hide link
** Transition time from hidden to visible is adjustable
* Added: "Reset to Default" button
* Show Edit Button if edit mode is active

This version has feature parity with link-to-tabs plugin from same date!

V0.2.0 - 2019-01-17

* remove the experimental flag

V0.2.0-experimental - 2018-02-13

* initial release
* forked from link-to-tabs V0.1.1
* add new "auto-edit" configuration for tab-links
* auto-edit is only active for non-shadow tiddlers `[!is[shadow]]`
* contains a temporary fix for a <$action-sendmessage widget parameter passing problem
** This fix should be deactivated in the future.

also see: https://wikilabs.github.io/editions/edit-tabs/#History
also see: https://wikilabs.github.io/editions/link-to-tabs/#History

$:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/readme.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/readme
$:/plugins/wikilabs/edit-tabs/readme.text:
This plugin adds a little link icon to every tab.

''Important:'' This plugin changes the core tabs macro.

! Link-to-Tabs Settings

{{$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/edit-tabs}}
